data.name: nvim_ui_attach
data.description: Activates UI events on the channel.

data.name: nvim_ui_detach
data.description: Deactivates UI events on the channel.

data.name: nvim_ui_pum_set_bounds
data.description:
Tells Nvim the geometry of the popumenu, to align floating
                windows with an external popup menu.

data.name: nvim_ui_pum_set_height
data.description:
Tells Nvim the number of elements displaying in the popumenu,
                to decide <PageUp> and <PageDown> movement.

data.name: nvim_ui_try_resize_grid
data.description:
Tell Nvim to resize a grid. Triggers a grid_resize event with
                the requested grid size or the maximum size if it exceeds size
                limits.
